antifraudAnalyses

This module exposes functions related to the /transactions/:transactionId/antifraud_analyses path.

Source:
  • resources/antifraudAnalyses.js, line 1

Methods

(inner) find(opts, body)

GET /transactions/:transactionId/antifraud_analyses Makes a request to /transactions/:transactionId/antifraud_analyses or to /transactions/:transactionId/antifraud_analyses/:id

Parameters:
Name Type Description
opts Object

An options params which is usually already bound by connect functions.
body Object

The payload for the request. API Reference for this payload

Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
transactionId Number

A specific transaction ID
id Number <optional>

The antifraud analyses' ID. If not sent, a antifraud analyses list will be returned instead.
Source:
  • resources/antifraudAnalyses.js, line 39
